text:
@piersmorgan There is plenty of evidence we build immunity after infection.

✅ It's known we develop antibodies to this coronavirus
✅ That they are retained for some period
✅ That monkeys retained them for at least 28 days
✅ That in other coronaviruses humans retain them for 1-3 years
